title: You can help choose Jumbo-Visma’s Tour de France jersey
content:
It’s not unusual for WorldTour teams to change their jerseys for the occasional bike race. It is unusual for those teams to let their fans decide which jersey they’ll end up racing in.

Jumbo-Visma will be rocking a different outfit for this year’s Tour de France and the Dutch team has reached out to supporters to help choose the new kit. There are three options available (from left to right below): The Black Bee, The Rapid Rebel, and The Transition.

Voting is open at the Jumbo-Visma website now and closes on April 15. The winning design will be announced the following day, and the jersey will be available for purchase a short time later. In a cool twist, the name of everyone that buys one of the limited-edition jerseys will be added to the team’s jersey for the three weeks of the Tour de France, “bring[ing] you closer to our team than ever before …”

So, which one do you like best?
